vulnerable_road_users.description: A dog is in the middle of the road, positioned slightly to the right from the perspective of the ego car.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: The dog poses a potential hazard as it may move unpredictably, requiring the ego car to be prepared to slow down or stop to avoid a collision.

general_perception.description and explanation: The traffic scene includes a vulnerable road user. Specifically, there is a dog positioned slightly to the right of the middle of the road from the ego car's perspective. This presents a potential hazard since the dog could move unpredictably. Consequently, the ego car must be prepared to either slow down or come to a stop to prevent a collision. There are no vehicles, traffic signs, traffic lights, traffic cones, barriers, or other objects reported in this scene.

1.description and explanation: This object is identified as a dog. Typically domesticated, dogs can be unpredictable in road scenarios. Their presence on or near a roadway necessitates caution from the driver of the ego car to prevent accidents or harm to the animal. Adjusting speed and being prepared to stop are advisable behaviors to ensure safety.

driving_suggestion: Reduce speed and prepare to stop if the dog moves. Increase following distance due to wet road conditions. Continuously monitor the road for any other unpredictable elements.
